name: Skeledirge
author: akagi
flavor_text: Skeledirge’s gentle singing soothes the souls of all that hear it. It burns its enemies to a crisp with flames of over 5,400 degrees Fahrenheit.

abilities.name: Unaware
abilities.effect: Prevent all effects of attacks used by your opponent’s Pokémon done to this Pokémon. (Damage is not an effect.)

attacks.name: Torcherto
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage for each Benched Pokémon (both yours and your opponent’s).
